item.title: Vital leprosy drugs due in Nigeria after year delay
item.description: Newly diagnosed patients may have suffered irreversible damage as a result of not having the drugs.

item.title: Twelve injured in shooting at Toronto pub
item.description: Three suspects remain at large and six of the injured suffered gunshot wounds say police.

item.title: Body found in floodwaters and troops injured in Australia storm
item.description: At least one man has died in floodwaters and military personnel have been injured in the wild weather.

item.title: Watch: 'Worst is yet to come' as ex-cyclone nears Australia
item.description: The BBC's Katy Watson reports from the Gold Coast, as strong winds and heavy rains batter the region.

item.title: Afghan women who fled Taliban to study abroad face return after USAID freeze
item.description: US aid funding enabled thousands of Afghan women to study abroad or online, but many of these programmes are now suspended.
